title: Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations        Little Big Horn Battlefield National Monument Special Use Permits  A special-use permit is required for activities that provide a benefit to an individual, group, or organization, rather than the public at large, and that require some degree of management from the National Park Service in order to protect park resources, culture and the public interest. For certain events and filmimg, sponsoring groups will require a special use permit, which is available through our web site on the links below. Application for Special Use Permit Filming Procedures_Application Requirements Application for Filming Permit
